thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 18 of 7315
thread.title: James A
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by James A

author: James A
title: James A
text:
The information on the web site is usually thorough. They do what they say, promptly. The worst I can say is the search on the Web site sometimes lists a bunch of irrelevant stuff.
B&H used to be where I went to find the high list price & thorough information on a product, now their prices have become much more competitive.
I've met them in person at the NAB convention. They've built their business by building their reputation.
